title: Simon Rattle - Leaving Home (7 Part Television Series)
description:
TV : Documentary : DVD quality : English


Sir Simon Rattle - Leaving Home (7 Part Arthaus Music TV Series) 

Leaving Home - Orchestral Music in the 20th Century

 

This is a high quality documentary series about 20th Century Classical Music, commencing from the famous Tristan chord and progressing onwards: Mahler, Schoenberg, R Strauss, Debussy, Sibelius, Stravinsky, Shostakovich, etc.

Part 1: Dancing on a Volcano
Part 2: Rhythm
Part 3: Colour
Part 4: Three Journeys
Part 5: Made in America
Part 6: After the Catastrophe
Part 7: Threads



Notes:


* All files are AVI files - audio is at high quality. File sizes vary according to how static the images in the program are.

* Each file is approximately 50 - 52 minutes running time. Total running time is about 6 hours.

* Aspect ratio is 4:3

* First broadcast in the UK about 10 years ago. Hard to obtain now as a box set.

* Being about music, these files would not lose that much content as audio-only - if someone wants to extract the audio and just upload those mp3 files as a separate torrent - be my guest.


Enjoy and Seed!!
